DOC.brief_summary: This open-label, non-randomized study was designed to compare pharmacokinetics of a single 50 milligram (mg) dose of MK-0822 in participants with and without moderate hepatic insufficiency (abnormal liver function) in order to determine to what degree hepatic dysfunction may impact therapeutic blood levels of MK-0822.
DOC.brief_title: Assessment of Pharmacokinetics of Single Dose Odanacatib (MK-0822) in Subjects With Moderate Hepatic Insufficiency (MK-0822-070)
